Well, Sable's little attunement is going to require a little work on my part.
Attunement? I thought we were getting a weapon?
Attunement? I thought we were getting a weapon? Has he been telling you more than me?
We actually already have what they're giving us. It won't do us any good until we've got our telepath bound to it though.

The prototype technology was the Cobalt Magnifier and we have that already, kid. Once bound to a particular telepath, it will allow us to use all that psionic energy we come across as a fuel for special weapons.

Alright, what is it that you need to do then?
Well what role are you supposed to be playing in all of this?

I'm supposed to get a hold of some refined crystals with a high level of Cobalt Flux. They'll somehow be used in the attunement. I don't know how that works, but I DO have experience with refining crystals.

All we need is for me to go gather the raw crystal right?
Let me guess, you're going to let me do all the mining and you'll sit back and look the crystal over once I'm done?
You got it, kid. Mine me up 30 tons of Crystal. With that much I should be able to get what we need if we take it to my workstation back in Erebus.
Yep, that's more or less how things are going to fly with me. Be sure not to stop until you've got 30 tons of the crystals at my workstation in Erebus.
